alert.note: Alert for Duval; Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 1:00PM EDT until August 11 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL NASSAU AND NORTH CENTRAL DUVAL COUNTIES... At 100 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ratliff, or near Jacksonville International Arpt, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville International Arpt, Ratliff and Nassau Village-Ratliff. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
